thread.title: Pumpkin Ball comes to the Convention Center - Thu, 22 Oct 2015 PST
thread.title_full: Pumpkin Ball comes to the Convention Center - Thu, 22 Oct 2015 PST

title: Pumpkin Ball comes to the Convention Center - Thu, 22 Oct 2015 PST
text:
Tags: spokane7 
The Pumpkin Ball 
What: Elegant evening benefiting the Sacred Heart Children’s Hospital and the Vanessa Behan Crisis Nursery. Wear your formal attire for high-end live and silent auctions, gourmet dining, music by the Cronkites and a live pumpkin carving contest. 
When: 5:30 p.m. Saturday 
Where: Saturday Spokane … 
The Pumpkin Ball 
What: Elegant evening benefiting the Sacred Heart Children’s Hospital and the Vanessa Behan Crisis Nursery. Wear your formal attire for high-end live and silent auctions, gourmet dining, music by the Cronkites and a live pumpkin carving contest. 
When: 5:30 p.m. Saturday 
Where: Saturday Spokane Convention Center, 334 W. Spokane Falls Blvd. 
Cost: $150
